tasks.task: Operator is maneuvering a piece of farming equipment as soil is being spread.
subtasks: Sit in the cockpit of the equipment.
Move the equipment along the field.
Adjust the angle and width of the spreader.
Engage the machinery's power source.
Control the rate at which the soil is spread.
Guide the equipment through corners and curves.
Overlap passes to cover the entire field evenly.
Operate the spreader mechanism.
Ensure the spread is even and consistent.
Monitor the spread pattern visually.
Adjust the spreader settings as needed during operation.
Align the spreader with the direction of travel.
Notify the operator when to adjust direction.
Ensure the spreader is properly maintained.
Walk the field to verify even distribution.
Identify areas needing more or less soil.
Note any clumps or variations in the spread.
Anticipate the need to make adjustments while in motion.
Use steering inputs to correct deviations in the spread pattern.
Inspect the spreader for damage before use.
Lubricate moving parts as necessary.
Check that all safety features are operational.

These tasks cover the major physical activities implied by the transcript. They range from the technical aspects of using the machinery to the visual and manual adjustments needed for effective operation., formatted with MAINTASK and SUBTASK.
